definition: floor area/occupied area/footprint (of a building, piece of equipment etc)
to take possession of/to occupy/to take up
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing

sentences.english: Terminal 3 of the airport is the single largest building, by floor space.
sentences.chinese: 机场的3号航站楼按占地面积来说是最大的独立建筑。

sentences.english: She is located in Haining city of Zhejiang province, covering an area of over 40,000 square meters.
sentences.chinese: 公司座落于浙江省海宁市，占地面积4万多平方米。

sentences.english: The New Campus of Jianghan University covers an area that is 3 times as big as the old campus.
sentences.chinese: 江汉大学新校区的占地面积是老校区的三倍。

sentences.english: The calender B type, use gas hester, it is saving the power and small floor space be occupy.
sentences.chinese: 型压光机是采用燃气加热，节约能源，占地面积小。

sentences.english: In total, the Riviera Coomera facility covers 14 hectares.
sentences.chinese: 里维埃拉高玛拉总部占地面积达到14公顷。

sentences.english: The company covers an area of about 800 square meters, 50 workers.
sentences.chinese: 本公司占地面积约为800平方米，工人50人。

sentences.english: S Existing industrial park covers an area of more than 20 acres.
sentences.chinese: 公司现有工业园占地面积20余亩。

sentences.english: Space required for modern biological waste treatment plants is large.
sentences.chinese: 现代生物废品处理站的占地面积很大。

sentences.english: The Sanxingdui Ruins Site covers a vast area of about 12 square kilometres.
sentences.chinese: 三星堆遗址占地面积很广，约有12平方公里。

sentences.english: To replace your factory covers an "area" of wear or cloth.
sentences.chinese: 以取代您的磨损或布厂占地面积。

sentences.english: Its area is equal to 14 hectares.
NMDAâ€™s project is a four storey mini-tower that covers an area of 585 square meters.
sentences.chinese: 整个工程的占地面积为585平方米。

sentences.english: Production base covers an area of 5600 square meters.
sentences.chinese: 生产基地占地面积5600平方米。

sentences.english: Small floor space iow investment and good effects.
sentences.chinese: 占地面积小，投资低，效果好。

sentences.english: The company total amount of investment is 100 million RMB and covers 316 acres.
sentences.chinese: 公司投资总额1亿元人民币，占地面积316亩。

definition: area (of a floor, piece of land etc)/surface area/tract of land
classifier for fields/unit of area equal to one fifteenth of a hectare
to be situated/to be located (of a building)
to be right next to/close neighbor
to be situated/located at (of building)/also written 坐落[zuo4 luo4]
square (as in square foot, square mile, square root)
